caption:
We chatted with Camila Carrillo (@_la_montanuela), a regenerative winemaker from #Vermont, about some of her top tips for green living during #EarthMonth and every other month of the year 🌎 

“When I think about sustainability, I think of two things: community and farming. From Colombia to Vermont, I have witnessed the importance of both. As a small farmer, and winemaker, community support is everything! Buying directly from your local farmer, supporting BIPOC and LGBTQ+ owned farms and businesses, or donating to those who may not have access, has a positive impact on your community and the earth. Living green for me is really about taking care of one another while taking care of our planet!" 

You can support local farmers and growers like @kalchewineco and @conscioushomestead but we encourage you to support your own local farmers this Earth Month and every month 🧑‍🌾
